account.description: The ID of the account that ran this record.

actionType.description: The type of action with which this record corresponds â€” *Send* for an outbound interchange, *Get* for an inbound interchange using the Disk, FTP, or SFTP communication method, or *Listen* for an inbound interchange using the AS2 or HTTP communication method.

atomId.description: The ID of the Runtime that processed this record.

connectorName.description: The value is *Trading Partner* for a Custom trading partner Send operation, or *Start* for a Custom trading partner Listen operation.

connectorType.description: *edicustom* is the connector type for any record.

customFields.description: Custom fields based on the fields configured on the **Document Tracking** tab of the **Setup** page. The names of the fields are dependent upon your account setup.

dateProcessed.description: The processing date and time of this record. Format is yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' \(for example, 2019-09-14T15:32:00Z\).

documentIndex.description: The numerical index of this record in the execution.

errorMessage.description: Any error message associated with this record. This field is omitted for a successful interchange.

fromTradingPartner.description: The name of the sending trading partner component.

operationName.description: The name of the operation component that processed the record.

size.description: The size, in bytes, of the document that corresponds to this record.

successful.description: Whether the record is a success or error.

toTradingPartner.description: The name of the receiving trading partner component.
